name: Space Wars 3D Star Combat Simulator: FREE THE GALAXY!
name_original: Space Wars 3D Star Combat Simulator: FREE THE GALAXY!
description:
(Note: In-App purchases are available to help you progress faster, but are not required to play the game in full!)

JOIN THE SPACE WARS!!

** By popular demand we've made the game much easier! And you can now select your own difficulty level. If you were stuck before, try again now! **

** Another big update for you!!
** v3 changes:
- New updated graphics including COCKPITS for each star fighter!
- Another new star fighter: Taipan Stealth, the smallest fighter with an auto-turret!
- New explosions! New galaxy map!
- More difficulty tweaks: choose Easy, Medium or Hard level.
- By popular demand: You now earn 20% more credits per kill.
- VIP Discount is now 40% (up from 20%!).
- Many more small fixes / tweaks.

KEEP YOUR FEEDBACK COMING! Email us from www.UselessiPhoneStuff.com! We listen!
**

Prepare to climb into the cockpit of a star fighter and free the galaxy with the Space Wars 3D Star Combat Simulator!

More than just a basic space shooter, Space Wars is a 3D space simulator for budding star pilots everywhere! Choose your ship, install your upgrades, and prepare to take on the alien menace!

Features:
- Addictive, fun, yet challenging game play. Play for 5 minutes, or 5 hours! Hours of star dogfights await you!
- Highly detailed real time 3D graphics that make use of the Retina display on both iPhone and the new iPad.
- Many different ships to fly, and destroy!
- Watch ships randomly fly apart as you blow them from the stars!
- Dynamic 3D sound, so you can hear what's coming and where.
- As you complete missions, you earn credits that can be used to unlock new ships, or install upgrades on your ships, including a Cloaking device, missiles and much much more!
- Each sector of space has a beautifully designed background, with dynamic 3D lighting. So the action is lit differently depending on what stars are in the area.
- Simple pick-up-and-play controls. Left thumb steers, right thumb shoots! Take some time to practice and you'll soon get the hang of it! Read the detailed tutorial for more info on the finer points of flying your space fighter!
- TILT CONTROLS are also available!
- Choose your own path to victory. Will you take an easier route and earn less credits? Or the difficult route and get the best ship ASAP? Or both?
- Climb up through the ranks of the Human Space Navy. Can you be the first Space Warlord on your block?
- Choose your strategy! Will you upgrade each ship as you go, or try to hold out and save your credits for the best ship you can get?
- Stuck on a mission? You can call for reinforcements!
- GameCenter achievements and leader boards. Can you be the Richest Pilot? Or the Deadliest?
- Clock mode which lets you watch all the action without the risk of getting space sick!
- COMPLETELY FREE TO PLAY!!
- and much more!
